original_text: Those who eat from the king’s provisions will try to destroy him; his army will be swept away, and many will fall in battle.
korean_text: 그의 음식을 먹는 자들이 그를 멸하리니 그의 군대가 흩어질 것이요 많은 사람이 엎드러져 죽으리라

sentences.original_text: Those who eat from the king's provisions
his army will be swept away
and many will fall in battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 많은 사람들이 전투에서 쓰러질 것이다
